DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate safety , tolerability , blood level effect CDP6038 administer intravenous infusion ( iv ) subcutaneous ( sc ) injection .
DOC.brief_title: The First Clinical Study Test Safety , Blood Levels Other Effects CDP6038 Healthy Males
DOC.criteria: Body mass index 19.0 28.0 kg/m² body weight ≥ 50 kg ≤ 120 kg Previous trial participation blood donation/loss within 3 month Subject healthy ( eg significant medical history , take drug treatment , psychological emotional problem , drug alcohol abuse ( current historical ) Plans actual vaccination within 3 month Previous drug treatment Tobacco use heavy caffeine consumption Systolic blood pressure < 90 > 145mmHg , diastolic blood pressure < 40 > 90mmHg heart rate < 45 > 90 beat per minute
